verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O the blood
Crimson love
Price of life's demand
Shameful sin
Placed on Him
The hope of every man

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
O the blood of Jesus washes me
O the blood of Jesus shed for me
What a sacrifice that saved my life
Yes, the blood it is my victory

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Savior, Son
Holy One
Slain so I can live
See the Lamb
The great I AM
Who takes away my sin

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
CHORUS:
O the blood of Jesus washes me
O the blood of Jesus shed for me
What a sacrifice that saved my life
Yes, the blood it is my victory

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh the blood of the Lamb
Oh the blood of the Lamb
Oh the blood of the Lamb
The precious blood of the Lamb
What a sacrifice
That saved my life
Yes the blood it is my victory

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O what love
No greater love
Grace how can it be
That in my sin
Yes even then
He shed His blood for me

O the blood of Jesus shed for me

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
What a sacrifice that saved my life
Yes, the blood it is my victory

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
What can wash away my sin?
Nothing but the blood of Jesus
What can make me whole again?
Nothing but the blood of Jesus
